about_the_game:
Festoon Player 
For 360 media enthusiasts, Fulldome Distributors, Exhibitors and Festival Curators.
 
  • Playback existing fulldome content in a virtual dome from any video or still image format (PNG,JPG).
  • Includes four pre-set virtual environments (standard dome, flat dome, cinema, equirectangular).
  • Playback of Mono, Stereo (Over Under) and Stereo (Side by Side).
  • Both VR and none VR support provided with anaglyph options for desktop stereo footage.

Media Support


Media Foundation
Media Foundation offers good support for most video formats. It comes as standard on both Windows 8 and 10.

DirectShow
If the video format you wish to use isn't support by Media Foundation then Directshow support is also offered allowing you to install any codecs needed for your media.

Image Support
Festoon Player image support includes PNG and JPG formats.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 970 or AMD R9 290 8GB or greater
  • Storage: 1 MB available space
  • VR Support: SteamVR
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel i5-4590 / AMD Ryzen 5 1500X or greater
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 / AMD Radeon RX 480 8GB or greater
  • Storage: 1 MB available space

short_description: Watch back your fulldome/360 degree or flat screen media in a virtual environment. Choose from 4 environments including, tilted dome, flat dome, equirectangular and cinema. Full VR and None VR is supported.
